name: Understanding & Working with Git
description: Learn what Git is and how developers use it to manage source code in a highly distributed manner.

name: Understanding & Working with GitHub
description: Learn the value of GitHub and how it is used not only to manage your team's source code, but also how it can help improve project management.
lessonNames: How to Use Git and GitHub

name: Advanced Git
description: Learn the workflows and techniques senior webdevs use to be more productive with Git and to solve everyday source code management problems.
lessonNames: How to Use Git and GitHub

name: Building Webpages
description: Learn how to build simple webpages using HTML and CSS
lessonNames: Course: Learn to Code HTML & CSS
